title: Terms of Enrampagement
description: Sterling Archer discovers his cancer medication is actually sugar pills and Zima. He investigates the pharmacy which leads him to the Irish mob.
quote: Did you see Regis this morning?
altHero: Archer in the woods, sick with sunken eyes, wears a headscarf and points a gun
alt2: Archer questions a mobster who is tied up and bleeding
alt3: Archer points a gun at another mobster
alt4: the mob boss in the woods, in a wheelchair and on oxygen
